item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/10/the-short-list/#comment-434323">Danny (ae86)</a>.
I used to like them way back, but they lost their appeal for me. Just not special enough in my opinion.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Danny (ae86).

I used to like them way back, but they lost their appeal for me. Just not special enough in my opinion.

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: awesome read, thanks for taking the time to respond, with full detail and a lot of thought, I just recently came across your blog from looking for regamasters re-powder coating colors. You might recall I made that comment on IG a month or so ago and have kept myself caught up with all your articles, keep up the good work.
item.content:encoded: awesome read, thanks for taking the time to respond, with full detail and a lot of thought, I just recently came across your blog from looking for regamasters re-powder coating colors. You might recall I made that comment on IG a month or so ago and have kept myself caught up with all your articles, keep up the good work.
